critical_issues.issue: Logistical items: •	The videos in Module 4 cut off the speech at each transition. •	Were these videos created with U.S. employment in mind? I ask because the video re: EE Wellness in Module 4 has examples and encourages AI use in ways that will get a U.S. employer in a lot of trouble. See my notes in that section.  Video 1 •	The video title says, “The ‘new reality’ of Customer Experience (CX)” – is this the correct title?  •	Additional concerns about video content (see attached) Article 1 - concerns regarding content (see attached) Video 2 - concerns regarding content (see attached) Discussion Q2 - •	Recommend changing the question from “Can you think of any drawbacks…” to “What are the drawbacks of…” Assignment 1: • Recommend including the word “current” in the assignment title, so it would say, “Map Your Current Recruitment Processes.” Assignment 2: • Instructions make it seem like this is a collaborative assignment, but that’s not the case if they are completing it and submitting it. Should this be a Discussion Q instead?  Discussion Q3: •	This question has nothing to do with the article. Is that intended?  Capstone Project Description: • Says, “Set specific and quantifiable customer experience objectives…” Is that right? Shouldn’t it be related to AI in HR?
critical_issues.details: Incorrect titles/descriptions. Concerns about content posing legal risks. See attached for details.

critical_issues.issue: Discussion Q1: •	I recommend adding, “why/why not” to the question.  Video 2: •	What does the Accenture example have to do with performance management? It wasn’t made clear. It seemed like it was referring to its use for B2C.  Discussion Q2, Article: •	Is this a verified blog? There are spelling/grammatical errors within.   Assignment 1: •	The instructions say to discuss answers with fellow learners, but this is an assignment. Should it be a Discussion Question instead? Otherwise, where should they discuss their answers? Video 3: •	Has a glitch – it repeats two parts of the video. Video 4: •	The description under this video is Video 3’s description.  •	The IBM Watson example concerns me. •	The Humanyze example for ID Badges is another privacy issue.  Discussion Q3: •	This question should be after Video 3. It is about compensation and has nothing to do with Video 4.  Capstone Project Description: • Says, “Set specific and quantifiable customer experience objectives…” Is that right? Shouldn’t it be related to AI in HR?

surprised at oversized clothing selection of speaker. Errors noted in several sections: section 2 - discussion question needs reworded - should say "how do you think AI can consider..." (instead of "think can AI" as it currently states) section 3 - in video, speaker uses terms "ERP" and "PLM" without explaining what these acronyms mean section 6 - related to Role Change Management When Implementing AI, in objectives (under video link) it states ..."foster technologically averse culture."  I believe this is the opposite of the author's intent.
apparent error in section 3 video objectives - states "AI transforms...but risks stagnation."  Shouldn't it say without AI there are risks of stagnation?
